languages.text: {n}Толпа смердит вершащейся изменой. В ее нотах я доискиваюсь до корня и понимаю, что так противоречит воле Его — на Его священную привилегию совершено покушение. Лишь Он решает, кому пора отправиться в странствие к Нему. Но эти... трое подстрекателей, они готовы решить за Него. И бросить в топку насилия души тех, кто окружил нас.{/n}

{n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа смердит вершащейся изменой. В ее нотах я доискиваюсь до корня и понимаю, что так противоречит воле Его — на Его священную привилегию совершено покушение. Лишь Он решает, кому пора отправиться в странствие к Нему. Но эти... трое подстрекателей, они готовы решить за Него. И бросить в топку насилия души тех, кто окружил нас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd stinks of unfolding treason. I delve down to its root and realise that His sacred privilege is being attacked contrary to His will. He alone decides who is to journey to Him, but these three... instigators are determined to make this decision for Him instead. And cast the souls of everyone around them into the fires of violence.{/n}

{n}The crowd stinks of unfolding treason. I delve down to its root and realise that His sacred privilege is being attacked contrary to His will. He alone decides who is to journey to Him, but these three... instigators are determined to make this decision for Him instead. And cast the souls of everyone around them into the fires of violence.{/n}

He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menge riecht nach aufsteigendem Verrat. Ich erspüre die Wurzeln und erkenne, was genau Seinen Willen so vehement ablehnt: Sein heiliges Privileg wird angegriffen. Er alleine bestimmt, wer zu Ihm reisen darf, doch diese drei ... Aufrührer sind entschlossen, diese Entscheidung für sich selbst zu treffen, und reißen die Seelen aller Umstehenden mit in das Feuer der Gewalt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

Aufrührer sind entschlossen, diese Entscheidung für sich selbst zu treffen, und reißen die Seelen aller Umstehenden mit in das Feuer der Gewalt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La muchedumbre apesta a traición incipiente. Me adentro en su núcleo y comprendo qué es lo que rechaza Su voluntad: están atacando Su privilegio sagrado. Solo Él decide quién puede acudir a Él, pero estos tres... agitadores están determinados a tomar la decisión por sí mismos, arrastrando a las llamas de la violencia las almas de todos cuantos les rodean.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆は反乱の悪臭を放っている。その元凶を掘り下げると、あの方の意志を拒絶するものの正体に気づいた。あの方の神聖な特権が攻撃されているのだ。あの方のもとへ旅立つ者を選べるのはあの方だけだが、この3人…この扇動者たちは、自分たちでこの決定を下そうと決意し、周囲の人々の魂を暴力の炎に引きずり込もうとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆は反乱の悪臭を放っている。その元凶を掘り下げると、あの方の意志を拒絶するものの正体に気づいた。あの方の神聖な特権が攻撃されているのだ。あの方のもとへ旅立つ者を選べるのはあの方だけだが、この3人…この扇動者たちは、自分たちでこの決定を下そうと決意し、周囲の人々の魂を暴力の炎に引きずり込もうとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}人群中弥漫着叛乱的臭味。我深入到根源之中，意识到究竟是什么拒绝了不死之神的意志——有人正打算篡夺祂的神圣权力。只有祂才有权力选择将谁带到祂身边，可眼前这三个……煽动者，他们却打算篡夺祂的权力。他们打算自行做出决定，将周围所有人的灵魂拖入暴虐的烈焰之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群中弥漫着叛乱的臭味。我深入到根源之中，意识到究竟是什么拒绝了不死之神的意志——有人正打算篡夺祂的神圣权力。只有祂才有权力选择将谁带到祂身边，可眼前这三个……煽动者，他们却打算篡夺祂的权力。他们打算自行做出决定，将周围所有人的灵魂拖入暴虐的烈焰之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La foule empeste la trahison naissante. Je plonge jusqu'à ses racines et je réalise ce qui rejette ainsi Sa volonté : la contestation de Son privilège sacré. Lui seul choisit ceux qui peuvent venir à Lui, mais ces trois... instigateurs sont déterminés à prendre la décision eux-mêmes, attirant les âmes autour d'eux dans les feux de la violence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalık, dallanıp budaklanan ihanetin leş gibi kokusuna bezenmiş. Köküne kadar kazıyorum ve O'nun iradesini böylesine reddedenin ne olduğunu kavrıyorum. O'nun kutsal şerefi saldırı altında. Yalnızca O, yolları kendisinde son bulacakları seçebilir fakat bu üçü... Kışkırtıcılar. Bu kararı kendileri vermeye kararlılar. Etraflarını saran ruhları kendileriyle birlikte vahşetin alevlerine sürüklüyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd reeks of flowering treason. I delve down to its root and realise what it is that rejects His will so: His sacred privilege is being attacked. He alone chooses who may journey to Him, but these three... instigators, they are determined to make this decision for themselves, dragging the souls of all around into the fires of violence with them.{/n}
